product_description: Heavy Conveyor Belt is designed for use as an abrasion resistant and impact resistant rubber sheet and is ideal for mounting pads, mechanical sealing strips and industrial flapping. In general construction and industrial use where durability is imperative and ordinary rubber is not up to the task, this rubber product is used to maximize the life of the project. Heavy Conveyor Belt is available in a 2ply and 3ply fabric insertions in the rubber sheet. The 2ply is 7.5 millimeters thick, and the 3ply is 10.5 millimeters thick. This is the most abrasion and tear resistant rubber product ideal for industrial bumpers and skirting. This rubber roll is made from a blend of Neoprene, SBR, and Nitrile Rubbers with a smooth, finished surface. It is used to maximize the life of a project where durability is imperative and ordinary rubber is not sufficient.

name: Ultimation Conveyor Replacement Roller 1.9″ Dia, 15″ BF, Galvanized Steel Conveyor Rollers for Belt & Material Handling - Metal Outfeed Stand, Ideal for Woodworking, Trailer, Load Assist (5 Packs)
short_description: HIGH-PERFORMANCE MATERIAL: Ultimation's 1.9" Diameter Conveyor Rollers come in a 5-pack, crafted from robust 16 Ga. galvanized steel tube for durability in heavy-duty applications.

PRECISION ENGINEERING: Featuring a 16-1/2" long 7/16" hex mild steel axle, our rollers ensure efficient material handling with a spring-retained end. The 15" between frames suits 18" overall width gravity conveyors.
SMOOTH OPERATION: Crimped and oiled bearings enhance performance, providing a reliable rolling surface. Each roller boasts a 268-pound load capacity, ensuring smooth, dependable conveyor function.

VERSATILE APPLICATION: With a 14-1/2" tube length (rolling surface), Ultimation's rollers are perfect for various uses, from conveyor systems to boat trailers. Explore the versatility of Ultimation's USRS19G-15-roller-5.

IDENTIFIABLE & TRACEABLE: Easily manage your inventory with the SKU: USRS19G-15-roller-5 and MPN: UIUSRS19G-15-roller-5, ensuring you always have Ultimation quality at your fingertips. Upgrade to Ultimation for heavy-duty, reliable material handling solutions.

name: VEVOR Belt Conveyor, 59 x 7.8 inch Conveyor Table, Stainless Steel Motorized Belt Conveyor PVC Belt Anti-Static Adjustable Speed (Double Guardrail)
short_description: Industrial-Grade Stainless Steel: Our belt conveyor boasts a sturdy stainless steel build, ensuring long-term durability and stability in any industrial setting. It is treated with special surface processing to optimize rust resistance and wear resistance.

PVC Conveyor Belt: With wear-resistant and anti-static properties, this PVC flat conveyor belt, measuring 59" x 7.8" and 0.08" thick, efficiently handles items of various sizes. The rotating screw provides precise adjustment of belt tension, while infinitely adjustable support feet ensure the belt remains stable in any working environment.

Multi-Adjustment System: Our flat conveyor belt system features adjustable speeds from 30 to 120 rotations per minute, with the ability to run in both directions. With the rotating screw and height-adjustable support feet, it adapts like a charm to different tasks and environments!

Efficient Motor: Our electric PVC conveyor comes with a high-performance motor equipped with automatic overheating protection. It shuts down at 88℃ (190.4℉) to prevent damage and restarts after cooling to 80℃ (176℉), ensuring continuous operation without the need for monitoring and improving production line efficiency.

Industry Compatibility: From chemical plants to pharmaceutical factories, food factories to auto parts plants, our PVC conveyor is tailor-made for various industries, meeting strict security, hygiene, and efficiency standards. Boost productivity, reduce downtime, and keep the workflow smooth with our conveyor system!
